name: The strange case of Ezequiel Crawley
name_original: The strange case of Ezequiel Crawley
description:
I received a letter today from the LAPD requesting my assistance in a multiple murder case that they have been unable to solve.

The murders have taken place over the past few months at an old abandoned place, that no one want to come, and all evidence points to a possible satanic cult as the culprit.

The LAPD has exhausted all leads and have now turned to me for help in solving this case.

Move: WSAD / LEFT JOYSTICK

Interaction: E / SOUTH BUTTON

Aim (Gun needed): ARROWS / RIGHT JOYSTICK

Shoot: SPACE / RIGHT TRIGGER

Heal: T / LEFT SHOULDER

Files: I / NORTH BUTTON

Delete Save: Start / ESCAPE

Game made in 7days for the Mdfry Games horror game jam #2 and

IGU Winter Jam 2023.

Hope you'll enjoy it.

Mathias Vera

Miguel Prud'hom

Konrad Banti
